message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll give you a chance to negotiate!
I'll give you a slightly better offer, but I'm not willing to give away too much yet!
That's a bit better, but I'm still hoping for a more generous offer!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more to make it worth my while!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think we can do better than this!
Alright, I'll take it! 50/50 is a fair split, and I'm happy to end the game here.
